caption: A plane soars through the sky, and the pilot closely monitors the dashboard. This aircraft is a fighter jet, performing rolls and dives in the air. Soon, it lands on the ground, and ground personnel approach. A man stands in front of the plane and speaks. The man continues his journey in the desert, kicking a few rocks on the ground. He rearranges the rocks, pointing and gesturing frequently. The man takes out a mirror, reflecting the blinding sunlight. He proceeds to a forest, running his hands through the wild grass. The video then transitions to a view of the Milky Way. The man drives through a grassland in his car, encountering animals like zebras and giraffes.
